content: **in cashmere merino bloom** materials - 3 skeins of purl soho s cashmere merino bloom 1 75% extra fine merino wool and 25% cashmere each skein is 218 yards/ 100 grams approximately 654 yards required we used dove gray - us 6 4 mm straight or circular needles 2 - note each skein yields approximately 20 inches of scarf so with 4 skeins you could make an 80-inch scarf gauge 27 stitches = 4 inches in pattern unstretched size finished measurements with rib unstretched 10 inches wide x 60 inches long **in mulberry merino** materials - 4 skeins of purl soho s mulberry merino 3 80% extra fine merino and 20% mulberry silk or approximately 872 yards we used the color black green - us 6 4 mm circular or straight needles 5 - note each skein yields approximately 20 inches so for a 60-inch scarf you d only need 3 skeins gauge 38 stitches = approximately 4 inches rib unstretched size finished measurements with rib unstretched 7 inches x 70 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/cashmere-merino-bloom html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/mulberry-merino 4 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=969 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html
